name: More Is Less
description:
More is Less is a classic Puzzle game inspired by Portal and the Talos Principle.

Puzzles are driven by a innovative new Physics system where More is Less, learn to adapt to the new environment. Learn , master and exploit this mechanic, while trying to solve these mind boggling puzzels.

Uncover the possiblities of a world in which MORE is LESS in 6 unique handcrafted Testchambers. Juggle weights between pressure plates, learn how to extent your jumps and find your way to the next elevator.

This game was created for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 over the course of a week by 2 developers.
